name: Greenies
description:
Hi, i'm Ky Somnus Yu i love games since i was a little baby and have been learning alone by years i hope you enjoy this.

Greenies is my first game in public, the idea here is that you need calm down and think about what to do because if you touch something then you can't touch it anymore, you can't walk eather only jumps and dashs, all this because of our protagonist Hero.

Hero has a mental disease that make him do those things. I will tell more about him in future updates.

The Tilesets that i have used to this build are not mine i just edited some of them to fit my necessities here this is the author go check it out:  https://opengameart.org/users/buch

Controls: 

keyboard: A/D (Directions), Shift (Dash), Space (Jump).

Xbox Controller: A (Jump), RB (Dash).

Make Games is my dream job, if you could help me i accept any donations.

Please let yout feedback at comments section i love hear the others about my projects and i like to hear critics i wan't to make the game better and better.

OPTIONS button does not work for now i will fix it soon...
